member.name: TKBLayoutType
member.summary: Elements of the TKBLayoutType enumeration are passed by an IME in a call to to specify the type of layout.

member.name: TKBLayoutType.TKBLT_UNDEFINED
member.summary: Undefined. If specified, it will cause the layout to fallback to a classic layout.

member.name: TKBLayoutType.TKBLT_CLASSIC
member.summary: The touch keyboard is to use a classic layout.

member.name: TKBLayoutType.TKBLT_OPTIMIZED
member.summary: The touch keyboard is to use a touch-optimized layout.
